info.title: AASAAN REST API
info.description: REST API endpoints are organized by resource type. You’ll need to use different endpoints depending on your app’s requirements.

active.description: Indicates whether the account is active

id.description: Unique identifier for the resource that was used to create this category

name.example: Head & Shoulders Anti Hairfall Anti Dandruff Shampoo

description.example: Now, ensure the good health of your hair with Head & Shoulders Anti Hairfall Anti Dandruff Shampoo that strengthens hair from its roots and cures dandruff. Be it dry, frizzy, or damaged, this shampoo can bring back the younger days of your hair within just a few days. The shampoo is richly indulgent and improves the experience of washing your hair. It makes your hair dandruff-free up to 100%. Do not fret over chemicals as the product is gentle in use and can be used every day.

shortDescription.example: Anti Dandruff Shampoo that strengthens hair from its roots and cures dandruff

channelId.description: ID of the channel for which price is being specified

regularPrice.description: Actual Price - should be greater than on equal to salesPrice

hide.description: Hides the product in the channel

isProductLevelTaxEnabled.description: Enable to enter CGST and SGST taxes

description.example: Head & Shoulders Anti Hairfall Anti Dandruff Shampoo that strengthens hair

variantAttributeValues.description: All Possible Variant Attribute Values that this parent product can have

value.description: List of all possible values that this attribute can have as variants

name.example: Head & Shoulders Anti Hairfall Anti Dandruff Shampoo 600ml

discount.description: The total discount for given order.

tax.description: The total tax for given order.

shipping.description: The shipping details for given order

payment.description: The payment details for given order

statusReason.example: Transaction failed due to network error

slug.description: Channel slug which appears in the website url.

200.description: A string response noting whether the category was deleted or not.

201.description: Categories created or updated in the category array, errors for those categories that couldn't be updated or created.

items.example: Category with CategoryId - category-id-1 is missing name

201.description: Brands created or update in an array and an array with errors for those brands which couldn't be updated.

items.example: Brand with BrandId - brand-id-1 is missing name

put.description: Create or update a new brand
Create a new product or update existing product with this PUT operation.

items.example: Product with ProductId - product-id-1 is missing categories

put.description: Create a new product or update existing product with this PUT operation.

post.summary: Create a new Variant of the specified base product.
